name: 20 To Break
description:
Rules aren't really made to be broken. But you don't care. You just want to cause as much havoc as possible, no matter how much trouble you get into. Featuring:
  • 20 Rules to break!
  • 14 Items to trade!
  • A cast of characters to irritate!
  • An insane amount of carefully crafted pixel art graphics!
  • An original soundtrack!
Controls:
  • WASD : Move
  • E : Interact
  • X : Drop
Contributors:
  • Oroshibu - Programming
  • GiM - Programming
  • Snakeblock - Art
  • Not Your Sagittarius - Art
  • JonTheRealJon - Art
  • Squp - Art
  • Baicherra - Art
  • Viktor Kraus - Music, Sounds
